byline.original: By ANNE BARNARD and HWAIDA SAAD

lead_paragraph: The capture by Islamist insurgents of the strategic northwestern city, Jisr al-Shoughour, is the latest in a series of setbacks for government forces as the insurgents advance toward the government-held coast.

headline.print_headline: Islamists Seize Control of Syrian City in Northwest
headline.main: Islamists Seize Control of Syrian City in Northwest

snippet: The capture by Islamist insurgents of the strategic northwestern city, Jisr al-Shoughour, is the latest in a series of setbacks for government forces as the insurgents advance toward the government-held coast.
abstract: Syrian insurgents seize additional parts of northern Idlib province, advancing further toward government-held coast; offensive highlights new level of coordination among antigovernment fighters, as well as Pres Bashar al-Assad's failure to retake provincial capital of Idlib.
